snippet.title: Blood and Zombies - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Humanity's waging total war against a horrific zombie apocalypse. Lead one of four of humanity's deadliest survivors against the horde in this first person, wave defense shooter. Load up your guns, set up turrets, sharpen your skills, and maybe you'll make it through the night.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1739880/Blood_And_Zombies/

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
